name: Income Tax Revision
description: Every 24h, every citizen is taxed based on their taxable income, which is the difference between their current wealth in Euro + landclaims * 100 and their weath in Euro + landclaims * 100 the last tick subtracting the tax amount of last tickthe taxLastTick is also saved. The citizen pays a tax of 25% of their taxable income between 500€ and 2000€ and 45% of their taxable income above 2000€

properties.Title: LandclaimTrade
properties.UserDescription: Track trade of landclaim papers, add/remove them from citizin claim count

List.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="CurrencyTrade">Buying</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="CurrencyTrade">Buying</ecoicon>: Was the good bought or sold by the initiating player?

Person.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who performed the interaction.

Count.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="CurrencyTrade">Number Of Items</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="CurrencyTrade">Number Of Items</ecoicon>: Number of items in the transaction

properties.Title: Wealth Calculation
properties.UserDescription:
Determin CitizenWealth by adding claims to wealth in euro

Reset CitizenWealth every hour as wealth + (claims * 100)
If number is less then 0 set CitizenWealth at 0

Citizen.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen currently being processed for the timer event.

properties.Title: Income Tax
properties.UserDescription:
Tax wealth based in the increase of CitizenWealth over 24 hours

Tax rate based on brackets0 - 500		  0% taxed501 - 2000		25% taxed
2001+		40% taxed

Case 1:the citizen has more than 2000€ taxable income. They get taxed 375€ (25% of their income between 500€ and 2000€) + 45% of their income over 2000€
Case 2:the citizen has less than 2000€ taxable income, but more than 500€ taxable income. They get taxed 25% of their income above 500€
Case 3: the citizen has less than 500€ taxable income. They are not affected by the income tax.
